{{also|Auch}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{der|de|goh|ouh}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*auk}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|ook||also}}, {{cog|fy|ek||also, too}}, {{cog|lb|och||also}}, {{cog|sv|och||and}}, {{cog|is|og||and}}, and obsolete/archaic {{cog|en|eke||also}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/aʊ̯x/}} {{a|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/aʊ̯/}} {{a|chiefly southern Germany and Austria; also in the northern half in some positions, e.g. before ''{{l|de|nicht}}''}} * {{audio|de|De-auch.ogg|audio}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[also]]; [[too]]; [[as well]] {{gloss|in addition to whatever or whoever has previously been listed}} #: {{ux|de|Ich will '''auch''' ein Eis.|''Stress on “auch”:'' I '''too''' want icecream.|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Ich will '''auch''' ein Eis.|''Stress on “Eis”:'' I want icecream, '''too'''.|inline=1}} # [[really]]; [[actually]]; [[indeed]] {{gloss|in fact; {{ngd|confirming a preceding statement by someone else}}}} #: {{ux|de|Ich will '''auch''' ein Eis.|''Stress on “will”:'' I '''actually do''' want icecream.|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Das ist '''auch''' so.|''Stress on “ist”:'' It '''really''' is like that.|inline=1}} # [[really]]; [[actually]]; ([[oh]]) [[so]] ({{ngd|used for emphasis}}) #:{{ux|de|Du bist '''auch''' witzig... Wie soll ich das denn ohne Auto alles schaffen?!|You’re '''oh so''' ingenious... How am I supposed to get all of this done without the car?! }} # [[even]] ({{n-g|implying an extreme example in the case mentioned, as compared to the implied reality}}) #: {{ux|de|'''Auch''' wenn das stimmt, ist es noch kein endgültiger Beweis.|'''Even''' if this is true, it is no definite proof.}} #: {{ux|de|'''Auch''' ein Professor schreibt schon mal was falsch.|'''Even''' a professor may misspell something at times.}} # [[ever]] {{n-g|as in [[whatever]], [[whenever]], [[however]], etc.}} #: {{ux|de|Was du '''auch''' tust, es wird immer einer besser sein.|What'''ever''' you do, someone will always do it better.}} # {{lb|de|rare|dated}} and [[so]] ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|also}} {{l|de|ebenfalls}}; {{l|de|ebenso}} * {{sense|even}} {{l|de|selbst}}; {{l|de|sogar}} * {{sense|really}} {{l|de|echt}}; {{l|de|wirklich}} ===Interjection=== {{head|de|interjection}} # {{ngd|in answering a yes-no question, used to express that the thing asked about covers part of the truth but not all of it}}; “[[yes]], and [[more]]” #: {{ux|de|Ach, du bist Bauingenieur.
